metadata.title: CVE-2016-0601 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.9 allows remote authenticatedusers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Partition.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
